name: Goo-Boy and the Maw of Darkness
name_original: Goo-Boy and the Maw of Darkness
description:
Barely born, an unknown force compels you to race to your end.

You are slowly dying.

Break the orbs and eat the strange liquid inside to survive and fulfill your destiny.

_______________________________________________________________________________

This week-end was fairly busy for me so I wasn't able to free much time. I managed to make something quick in the end, and I'm pretty happy with the result. Feel free to talk to me on Twitter @Pandanym.

Huge thanks to @GFaguet for making the sounds.

Made for Ludum Dare 39
